[[Randall Munroe]] posted a sample winning strategy in 2007 on the news page of his [[webcomic]], [[xkcd]]. He based his solution on the [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]] dictionary. [http://blag.xkcd.com/2007/12/31/ghost/ Randall's Solution]
